thread.title: Russian tycoon Deripaska's sanction survival guide

title: Russian tycoon Deripaska's sanction survival guide
text:
Russian tycoon Deripaska's sanction survival guide 10:29am EDT - 02:12 
Russian metals tycoon Oleg Deripaska is one of the biggest names to be added to a U.S. sanctions blacklist. Reuters has taken a look at what it means for his firms, including aluminium producer Rusal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian metals tycoon Oleg Deripaska is one of the biggest names to be added to a U.S. sanctions blacklist. Reuters has taken a look at what it means for his firms, including aluminium producer Rusal. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qr3L4K
